dependencies.description:
Bowtie 2 is an ultrafast and memory-efficient tool for aligning
sequencing reads to long reference sequences
dependencies.name: bowtie2

dependencies.description: The free and opensource java implementation
dependencies.name: java

dependencies.description:
Pilon is an automated genome assembly improvement and variant detection
tool.
dependencies.name: pilon

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependencies.description:
Ultrafast consensus module for raw de novo genome assembly of long
uncorrected reads.
dependencies.name: racon

dependencies.description:
SAM Tools provide various utilities for manipulating alignments in the
SAM format, including sorting, merging, indexing and generating
alignments in a per-position format
dependencies.name: samtools

dependencies.description:
SPAdes - St. Petersburg genome assembler - is intended for both standard
isolates and single-cell MDA bacteria assemblies.
dependencies.name: spades

description:
Unicycler is an assembly pipeline for bacterial genomes. It can assemble
Illumina-only read sets where it functions as a SPAdes-optimiser. It can
also assembly long-read-only sets (PacBio or Nanopore) where it runs a
miniasm+Racon pipeline. For the best possible assemblies, give it both
Illumina reads and long reads, and it will conduct a hybrid assembly.
name: py-unicycler

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
